item.title: VS Codium
item.description: VS Codium Installing VS Codium on Ubuntu Open the Ubuntu Software application. By default, the application is available from the application bar on the left side of the screen. In the upper-left corner of the application window, click the search icon. In the search field that opens, enter VS Codium In the results, click VS Codium. In the application details that open, click Install. In the pop-up that opens, enter your user password and press ENTER.
